name: Ball of Hope
description:
Game made for Extra Jam 2. It's my first "completed" game, and I'm overwhelmed with my Game Designing skills. Pls kill me.

Controls: Hold Space to fly, press ESC to quit (you'll probably need this one more ).

Life hack: press M to disable annoying music.

PS: Background color turns blue, which symbolizes hope. That's actually the only reference to Jam's theme, which is Hopefulness.
